titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2838) to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard for fiscal years 2012 through 2015, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-267, by Mr. Webster.

The resolution makes in order as original text for the purpose of amendment an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of the Rules Committee Print of H.R. 2838 dated October 21, 2011. All points of order against the amendment in the nature of a substiture made in order as original text are waived. At any time on the legislative day of November 4, 2011, it shall be in order for the Speaker to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules relating to a measure addressing the applicability of the coastwise trade laws.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 86.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 455.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 455, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote announced that the ayes had prevailed. Ms. Slaughter demanded the yeas and nays, and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 177 (Roll no. 829).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 245 - 166 (Roll no. 830).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/3/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2838) to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard for fiscal years 2012 through 2015.
